column4: hi. is it just me that seem to get these random eat-all-memory-and-become-unresponsive-until-swap-is-full-errors much more often on ubuntu than on any other distro?
i cant say that ive ever had that problem on any disrto.
not me either, until hoary i think (now breezy). right now i clicked on a jpg-link in evolution - freeze.
